document_data.mainbody:
Gostaraj, also called the Reaver King, was a mercenary lord and a priest of Garagos commanding the House of Steel. He was the King of Westgate from 900 to 927 DR.
Around age thirty-five, Gostaraj seized the throne of Westgate from the Prince Templars in a bloody rebellion in the . He ruled until his death of sixty-two in the .
